title: Cannot connect to cellular network
content:
My Pixel 4a is not able to connect to mobile network. I am not able to call, send SMS or use mobile data. There is a little X on a signal strength icon. Also in the SIM status in about phone it shows that network is unknown. The phone is SIM unlocked and I did all the updates.

Steps I tried so far:
I tried turning airplane mode on and off,
turning the phone on and off,
removing / reinserting the SIM card,
using a different SIM card,
using an eSIM instead of a SIM card (it connects successfully but there is not connection),
factory reset.
